scripts.styles:sass: node-sass scss/index.scss dist/collectorium.css && node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-magic-importer/dist/cli.js demo/scss/index.scss demo/dist/index.css
scripts.styles:postcss: postcss --use autoprefixer --replace dist/**/*.css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace demo/dist/**/*.css
scripts.styles:minify: cleancss --output dist/collectorium.min.css dist/collectorium.css && cleancss --output demo/dist/index.min.css demo/dist/index.css
scripts.styles: npm run styles:sass && npm run styles:postcss && npm run styles:minify
scripts.scripts: npm run scripts:bundle && npm run scripts:minify
scripts.build: npm run styles && npm run scripts
scripts.watch:styles: onchange scss/**/*.scss demo/scss/**/*.scss -- npm run styles
scripts.lint: npm run lint:styles && npm run lint:scripts
scripts.demo: mkdir -p demo/vendor && cp -R node_modules/highlight.js demo/vendor && npm run build && cp -R dist/ demo/vendor/collectorium
scripts.test:acceptance: npm run demo && testcafe chrome,firefox test/acceptance/ --app 'http-server demo/ -p 1337 -s'
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:acceptance
scripts.deploy: npm run demo && rsync -avz --delete --exclude=/.* --exclude=/error --exclude=/stats --exclude=/google15e4ae9ecda47ac0.html -e ssh demo/ vs0.oberlehner.net:/var/www/collectorium.oberlehner.net/web
